meanings.definition: A written record or note of something to be remembered or noted.
meanings.sent1: I always keep a memoranda of important dates in my planner.
meanings.sent2: The office manager distributed the memoranda outlining the new company policy.
meanings.sent3: The memoranda of my grocery list was so detailed, I ended up buying everything twice!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a memoranda, storing every detail with precision.
meanings.sent5: The memoranda of the crime scene was crucial evidence in solving the case.

meanings.definition: A document serving as a record or summary of a meeting or discussion.
meanings.sent1: Please review the memoranda from yesterday's staff meeting.
meanings.sent2: The CEO asked the secretary to prepare a memoranda for the board members.
meanings.sent3: The memoranda of the team meeting was accidentally sent to the wrong department!
meanings.sent4: The memoranda acted as a roadmap for the project's next steps.
meanings.sent5: The memoranda of the negotiation highlighted key points for further discussion.
